mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_CRM_CLAIM_INNER_INQUIRE.nextval FROM DUAL
insert into CRM_CLAIM_INNER_INQUIRE (SID, CLAIM_NO, LOGISTICS_PROCESS, END_PROCESSING_TECH, OUT_INQUIRE_FACT, CLAIM_CONFIRM, CLAIM_VERDICT, IMPROVEMENT, INQUIRE_STATE, MEMO, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DT, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DT, VERSION,PRODUCTION_PROCESS_INVESTIGATI, PRODUCTION_PROCESS_PHOTO,QUALITY_GRADE,ORIGINAL_JUDGEMENT_RESULT, SURFACE_STRUCTURE,PRODUCTION_PROCESS_TEXT,PRODUCTION_PROCESS_ALL ) values (#{sid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logisticsProcess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endProcessingTech,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outInquireFact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{claimConfirm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{claimVerdict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{improvement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inquireState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{productionProcessInvestigati,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{productionProcessPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{qualityGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalJudgementResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{surfaceStructure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{productionProcessText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productionProcessAll,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

SELECT SEQ_CRM_CLAIM_INNER_INQUIRE.nextval FROM DUAL
insert into CRM_CLAIM_INNER_INQUIRE
SID,
CLAIM_NO,
LOGISTICS_PROCESS,
END_PROCESSING_TECH,
OUT_INQUIRE_FACT,
CLAIM_CONFIRM,
CLAIM_VERDICT,
IMPROVEMENT,
INQUIRE_STATE,
MEMO,
CREATE_BY,
CREATE_DT,
UPDATE_BY,
UPDATE_DT,
VERSION,
PRODUCTION_PROCESS_INVESTIGATI,
PRODUCTION_PROCESS_PHOTO,
QUALITY_GRADE,
ORIGINAL_JUDGEMENT_RESULT,
SURFACE_STRUCTURE,
PRODUCTION_PROCESS_TEXT,
PRODUCTION_PROCESS_ALL,
#{sid,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
#{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{logisticsProcess,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{endProcessingTech,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{outInquireFact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{claimConfirm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{claimVerdict,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{improvement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{inquireState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{version,jdbcType=NUMERIC},

mapper.update:
update CRM_CLAIM_INNER_INQUIRE
set version = version + 1,
OUT_INQUIRE_FACT = #{outInquireFact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLAIM_CONFIRM = #{claimConfirm,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
CLAIM_VERDICT = #{claimVerdict,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMPROVEMENT = #{improvement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCTION_PROCESS_INVESTIGATI = #{productionProcessInvestigati,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCTION_PROCESS_PHOTO = #{productionProcessPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUALITY_GRADE = #{qualityGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORIGINAL_JUDGEMENT_RESULT = #{originalJudgementResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SURFACE_STRUCTURE = #{surfaceStructure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCTION_PROCESS_TEXT = #{productionProcessText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCTION_PROCESS_ALL= #{productionProcessAll,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where CLAIM_NO = #{claimNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
